languages.text: "Ты... был мне семьей, наставник. Ты и Кровавая паутина. Я не оскверню себя ложью".
"You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
languages.original_text: "Ты... был мне семьей, наставник. Ты и Кровавая паутина. Я не оскверню себя ложью".

traits.locale_text: "You... were my family, mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
"You... were my family, mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
"You... were my family, mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
"You... were my family, mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
"You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
"You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."

languages.text: « Vous... vous étiez ma seule famille, mentor. Vous et la Toile de Sang. Je ne m'abaisserai pas à mentir en soutenant le contraire. »
languages.original_text: "You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."

traits.locale_text: « Vous... vous étiez ma seule famille, mentor. Vous et la Toile de Sang. Je ne m'abaisserai pas à mentir en soutenant le contraire. »

languages.text: «Usted era... mi familia, mentor. Usted y la Red Sanguinolenta. No viviré de una mentira».
languages.original_text: "You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."

traits.locale_text: «Usted era... mi familia, mentor. Usted y la Red Sanguinolenta. No viviré de una mentira».

languages.text: 「あなたは…我が家族でした、師匠。あなたとブラッドスパン・ウェブが家族です。偽りでそのことを汚すことはしません」
languages.original_text: "You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは…我が家族でした、師匠。あなたとブラッドスパン・ウェブが家族です。偽りでそのことを汚すことはしません」

languages.text: “曾经的你……就是我的家人，导师。你和织血罗网的成员都曾是我的家人，我不愿用谎言来玷污自己。”
languages.original_text: "You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."

traits.locale_text: “曾经的你……就是我的家人，导师。你和织血罗网的成员都曾是我的家人，我不愿用谎言来玷污自己。”

languages.text: "Ihr ... wart meine Familie, Mentor. Ihr und das Blutgesponnene Netz. Ihr werde mich nicht durch eine Lüge selbst schänden."
languages.original_text: "You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... wart meine Familie, Mentor. Ihr und das Blutgesponnene Netz. Ihr werde mich nicht durch eine Lüge selbst schänden."

languages.text: "Siz... Benim ailemdiniz Yönderim. Siz ve Kanipi Ağı... Kendimi yalanla kirletmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "You... were my family, Mentor. You and the Bloodspun Web. I will not defile myself with a lie."
